About Me

I’m an artistic person and have graphic design, photography and technology for hobbies. With those hobbies that I'm working on plus having a supportive education so I’ve been trained to think creatively and in detail to solve problems and I’m not having any problems for learning something new.

I’m a D3 graduate of Instrumentation Technology major. And because almost all of the major’s subjects relate or contain programming so I decided to deepen my programming skills especially in web/apps.
